Alias.name: Set Container
Alias.script:
--syntax: setcontainer xxx
container = container or {}
if matches[3] then container.first = matches[4] cecho("Container is set as: <gold>" .. matches[4] .. "
") elseif container.first then cecho("Container is set as: <gold>" .. container.first .. "
") else cecho("<red>Container not set!
") end

Alias.name: Delete Container
Set Drink
Alias.script:
--syntax: setdrink
drink = drink or {}
if matches[3] then drink.first = matches[4] cecho("Drink is set as: <gold>" .. matches[4] .. "
") elseif drink.first then cecho("Drink is set as: <gold>" .. drink.first .. "
") else cecho("<red>Drink not set!
") end

Alias.name: Delete Drink
